name: HELL'S NEW WORLD
description:
Welcome to Hell, enjoy your stay. Fight and kill faster than they can fight and kill you, or else you will just be fought and killed again. Battle deeper into Hell through a campaign with demons, weapons, powerups, and secrets. Play on HELL difficulty to experience true suffering, or tone it down to save your sanity.

If scripted enemies aren't your thing, get your fellow sinners involved and start killing eachother in online deathmatch. Create your own maps and gameplay mutators to customize your fun.
